amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being made available to keep in effect an exemption for a clinical trial that concerns a life-threatening disease or condition and is not included in the registry of such trials. Amendment also seeks to prohibit the use of funds to approve certain applications.

action.text: Mr. Bonilla raised a point of order against the Stupak amendment (A016). Mr. Bonilla stated that the amendment seeks to impose new duties and changes existing law. The Chair sustained the point of order.
